documentation.text:
@title SelectorTokenGasLimitManager
 @dev Multi token mediator functionality for managing request gas limits.

@dev Throws if provided gas limit is greater then the maximum allowed gas limit in the AMB contract.
 @param _gasLimit gas limit value to check.

@dev Tells the default gas limit to be used in the message execution by the AMB bridge on the other network.
 @return the gas limit for the message execution.

@dev Sets the default values for different Omnibridge selectors.
 @param _gasLimits array with 7 gas limits for the following selectors of the outgoing messages:
 - deployAndHandleBridgedTokens, deployAndHandleBridgedTokensAndCall
 - handleBridgedTokens, handleBridgedTokensAndCall
 - handleNativeTokens, handleNativeTokensAndCall
 - fixFailedMessage
 Only the owner can call this method.

attributes.text:
@title SelectorTokenGasLimitManager
 @dev Multi token mediator functionality for managing request gas limits.

@dev Throws if provided gas limit is greater then the maximum allowed gas limit in the AMB contract.
 @param _gasLimit gas limit value to check.

@dev Tells the default gas limit to be used in the message execution by the AMB bridge on the other network.
 @return the gas limit for the message execution.

@dev Sets the default values for different Omnibridge selectors.
 @param _gasLimits array with 7 gas limits for the following selectors of the outgoing messages:
 - deployAndHandleBridgedTokens, deployAndHandleBridgedTokensAndCall
 - handleBridgedTokens, handleBridgedTokensAndCall
 - handleNativeTokens, handleNativeTokensAndCall
 - fixFailedMessage
 Only the owner can call this method.

devdoc.details: Multi token mediator functionality for managing request gas limits.

getModuleInterfacesVersion().details: Tells the module interface version that this contract supports.

requestGasLimit().details: Tells the default gas limit to be used in the message execution by the AMB bridge on the other network.

returns._0: the gas limit for the message execution.

requestGasLimit(bytes).details: Tells the gas limit to use for the message execution by the AMB bridge on the other network.

params._data: calldata to be used on the other side of the bridge, when execution a message.

returns._0: the gas limit for the message execution.

requestGasLimit(bytes4).details: Tells the selector-specific gas limit to be used in the message execution by the AMB bridge on the other network.

params._selector: method selector for the passed message.

returns._0: the gas limit for the message execution.

requestGasLimit(bytes4,address).details: Tells the token-specific gas limit to be used in the message execution by the AMB bridge on the other network.

params._selector: method selector for the passed message.
params._token: address of the native token that is used in the first argument of handleBridgedTokens/handleNativeTokens.

returns._0: the gas limit for the message execution.

setBridgedTokenRequestGasLimits(address,.details: Sets the request gas limits for some specific token bridged from Foreign side of the bridge.

params._gasLimits: array with 2 gas limits for the following selectors of the outgoing messages: - handleNativeTokens, handleNativeTokensAndCall Only the owner can call this method.
params._token: address of the native token contract on the Foreign side.

setCommonRequestGasLimits(uint256[]).details: Sets the default values for different Omnibridge selectors.

params._gasLimits: array with 7 gas limits for the following selectors of the outgoing messages: - deployAndHandleBridgedTokens, deployAndHandleBridgedTokensAndCall - handleBridgedTokens, handleBridgedTokensAndCall - handleNativeTokens, handleNativeTokensAndCall - fixFailedMessage Only the owner can call this method.

setNativeTokenRequestGasLimits(address,u.details: Sets the request gas limits for some specific token native to the Home side of the bridge.

params._gasLimits: array with 4 gas limits for the following selectors of the outgoing messages: - deployAndHandleBridgedTokens, deployAndHandleBridgedTokensAndCall - handleBridgedTokens, handleBridgedTokensAndCall Only the owner can call this method.
params._token: address of the native token contract on the Home side.

setRequestGasLimit(bytes4,address,uint25.details: Sets the token-specific gas limit to be used in the message execution by the AMB bridge on the other network. This value can't exceed the parameter maxGasPerTx defined on the AMB bridge. Only the owner can call this method.

params._gasLimit: the gas limit for the message execution.
params._selector: method selector of the outgoing message payload.
params._token: address of the native token that is used in the first argument of handleBridgedTokens/handleNativeTokens.

setRequestGasLimit(bytes4,uint256).details: Sets the selector-specific gas limit to be used in the message execution by the AMB bridge on the other network. This value can't exceed the parameter maxGasPerTx defined on the AMB bridge. Only the owner can call this method.

params._gasLimit: the gas limit for the message execution.
params._selector: method selector of the outgoing message payload.

setRequestGasLimit(uint256).details: Sets the default gas limit to be used in the message execution by the AMB bridge on the other network. This value can't exceed the parameter maxGasPerTx defined on the AMB bridge. Only the owner can call this method.

params._gasLimit: the gas limit for the message execution.

transferOwnership(address).details: Changes the owner of this contract.

devdoc.title: SelectorTokenGasLimitManager
